# initialSegmentStartTime

**Instance Property**

The start time of the initial segment.

## Declaration

```swift
var initialSegmentStartTime: CMTime { get set }
```

## Discussion

This value is relevant only when the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAssetWriter/preferredOutputSegmentInterval] property value is positive numeric, in which case you must set a numeric time.

You can’t change this value after writing starts.

## Configuring segment writing

- **delegate**: A delegate object that responds to asset-writing events.
- **AVAssetWriterDelegate**: A delegate protocol that defines the methods to implement to respond to asset-writing events.
- **preferredOutputSegmentInterval**: The interval of output segments that you prefer.
- **outputFileTypeProfile**: A profile for the output file type.
- **flushSegment()**: Closes the current segment and outputs it to a delegate method.
